response.overview: Brainy Baby is university studied and published in JOCAM Journal of Children and Media. Parents tell us their children love to watch them again and again, learning something new each time. Brainy Baby interactive DVDs feature live action and real children. Brainy Baby Spanish teaches the Spanish language using everyday objects in familiar surroundings to make fast learning connections. Over 50 words such as colors, numbers, favorite objects, action words and familiar phrases are introduced by a native Spanish language narrator. Your child will hear lively music with a gentle, instructional voice describing what your child is seeing. Video uses the teach, repeat, review method throughout. Brainy Baby Spanish DVD includes special features such as, Baby Bloopers, Behind the Scenes, Video Sing a Long and an Interactive Activity. 45 minutes in length. For ages 1 to 5 years.
response.tagline: Brainy Baby Spanish DVD: Simple Words and Phrases Classic Edition
response.title: Brainy Baby - Spanish
